title: [1.8.9][自带音乐]神秘5+女仆+盖亚整合包！！！
txt_content:
本帖最后由 2804151038 于 2018-12-5 17:34 编辑 
http://www.xiami.com/widget/198490936_198014044_235_346_FF8719_494949_0/collectPlayer.swf

一边听音乐一边看整合包
这次我给大家带来了神秘时代5的整合包！！！If there are any shortcomings.please excuse me！！若有不足之处.请多多担待！




介绍本整合包难度一般.大部分都是神秘和神秘的扩展.下面来看看Mod有哪些！


ModBaubles-1.8.9-1.1.3.0 饰品栏[JEI掉落物扩展]JustEnoughResources-1.8.9-0.4.0[JEI神秘时代扩展]JEIAddons_1.8.9-0.12.0.57[JEI物品管理器]jei_1.8.9-2.28.7.174[拔刀剑]SlashBlade-mc1.8.9-r9[壁炉传送]Floocraft-1.8.9-0.2[不再有合成冲突]NoMoreRecipeConflict-1.8.x-0.3-CN[储存抽屉]StorageDrawers-1.8.9-2.6.5[储存抽屉前置]Chameleon-1.8.9-1.1.2[村庄盒子]villagebox-1.8.9-0.4.0[凡家物语]MCA-1.8.9-5.1.2-universal[凡家物语前置]RadixCore-1.8.9-2.1.0-universal[更多门]mal**doors-1.8.9-3.0.2[更多门前置]mal**core-1.8.9-2.0.5[更多生物群系]BiomesOPlenty-1.8.9-3.0.0.2004-universal[怪物娘化]YarrCuteMobModelsRemake-1.0.11-1.8.9[家具]MrCrayfish's Furniture-4.0.1[剑座]Fatalitiii's-Pedestal-Mod-1.8.9[矿脉矿工]VeinMiner-0.33.0-1.8.9r540+f76d5e0[旅行地图]journeymap-1.8.9-5.2.0-unlimited[魔典盖亚3]GrimoireOfGaia3-1.8.9-1.3.3[神秘Bases前置]DummyCore-2.2.189.0[神秘时代5]Thaumcraft-1.8.9-5.2.4[神秘拓展]DarkUtilities-1.8.9-1.0.0.18[神秘拓展]Talismans2-1.8.9-2.2.1[神秘拓展]Thaumaturgical Knowledge - 1.8.9-0.2.2[神秘拓展]Thaumic Potatoes-1.8.9-1.0.2[神秘拓展]ThaumicBases-2.1.189.32[神秘注魔]ThaumicInfusion-1.8.9-4.87[书架]Bookshelf-1.8.9-1.1.2.206[书架]Bookshelf-API-1.8.9-2.3.7[鼠标手势]MouseTweaks-2.6.0-mc1.8.9[死亡不掉落]KeepingInventory-1.8.9-2.1修复版[糖果世界]CandyCraft-1.3.1-1.8.9-CN[我看到的是什么]WIT-1.8.9-1.0.8-23-CN[武器箱战利品]weaponcaseloot-1.8.9-2.0.0[物品整理]InventoryTweaks-1.60-40[邪恶工艺]EvilCraft-1.8.9-0.9.8[邪恶工艺前置]CyclopsCore-1.8.9-0.5.7[血魔法]BloodMagic1.8.9-2.0.0-20[叶子快速腐烂]FastLeaveDecay-1.2[优化]BetterFps-1.2.0[植物魔法]Botania-unofficial.r1.8-299CustomSkinLoader_1.8.8-13.6 皮肤补丁EBLib-EL3B13-1.8.x可选Mod[僵尸意识]zombieawareness-1.8.9-1.9.7[僵尸意识前置]coroutil-1.8.9-1.1.4[自动存档]AromaBackup-Mod-1.8.9[自动存档]前置Aroma1997Core-1.8.9输入修正InputFix---作者/开发团队ZlainSama启动器：HMCL---作者/开发团队：huanghongxun
